survey.messages: Please type a number between 0-7 or type S to skip the question:
How many days in the past week did you do something to keep your child(ren) safe, such as make sure they don't spend time alone with unknown adults/children or walk home alone outside after dark?
How many days in the past week did you shout, yell, or scream at your child(ren)?
How many days in the past week did you discipline your child(ren) physically, such as hitting them with your hand or another object?
How many days in the past week did you try to speak calmly with your child when you were upset with them?
How many days in the past week did you have a meaningful conversation with your child(ren) about how they‚Äôre doing amidst the current war, displacement, and other tough times?

congrats_data.msg:
You have completed the programme. Well done!
Remember, you can always return to ParentText to review these tips. Just type {MENU}.
congrats_data.extra_msg: Was ParentText helpful? If so, share it with a friend. Just send this link: {insert link}

delivery_messages.msg: This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)
